<Extension()> Public Function ListMetrics (operations As IPartitionKeyRangeIdRegionOperations, resourceGroupName As String, accountName As String, region As String, databaseRid As String, collectionRid As String, partitionKeyRangeId As String, filter As String) As IEnumerable(Of PartitionMetric)

static member ListMetrics : Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.IPartitionKeyRangeIdRegionOperations * string * string * string * string * string * string * string -> seq<Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.Models.PartitionMetric>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Azure.Management.CosmosDB.PartitionKeyRangeIdRegionOperationsExtensions.ListMetrics (operations, resourceGroupName, accountName, region, databaseRid, collectionRid, partitionKeyRangeId, filter)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.
Partition Key Range Id for which to get data.

An OData filter expression that describes a subset of metrics to return. The parameters that can be filtered are name.value (name of the metric, can have an or of multiple names), startTime, endTime, and timeGrain. The supported operator is eq.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the metrics determined by the given filter for the given partition key range id and region.
